meanings.definition: Resembling a pod in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The small, podlike spacecraft floated gracefully in space.
meanings.sent2: The peas were stored in a podlike container.
meanings.sent3: The podlike car looked like a futuristic vehicle from a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: Her podlike purse held all her essentials in a compact space.
meanings.sent5: The podlike building stood out among the traditional architecture of the town.
